title: Leadership Competency Enhancement: Blended Learning-Based Practical Mathematics Skill Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate practical mathematical problem-solving skills by completing over 80% of project-based assignments in blended learning environments
Learners interpret complex mathematical concepts with 90% accuracy by integrating online learning modules and in-person instruction.
Learners improve team project outcomes by 75% or more by sharing knowledge with peers using digital collaboration tools at least twice weekly.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
